Posts.Content: The term "Pink Bus" is foriegn to me but I'm quickly undersanding.   First I would like to say congrats on the up coming wedding of your daughter, what a joyous time.  Have lots of fun making those future plans and building yet more family memories. May all your tests go well and that things will balance out.  I pray for you and all cancer patiences. Best of luck and lots of positive thoughts!
Posts.Title: Pink Bus on Tuesday

Posts.Content: I"m new to the board and came across this thread about chenheart.  She sounds like a real trooper with a heart of gold for all the pain she is going through and with all the positive support and prayers of the people of this thread will help her get through this. My thoughts and prayers are also with you Chenheart.  God Bless   Sharon F. Las Vegas, NV
